nodes.text: Mack was a male member of Lourna Dee's Tempest and a Strike working under Cloud Ultident Margrona during the High Republic Era. Mack was also present at the Raid on Elphrona in around 232 BBY.He was killed at the hands of Jedi Indeera Stokes while she was rescuing Ronn Blythe from Margrona's starship.
